title: Elijah Cummings said Democrats gave black people the right to vote?
subtitle: Mimi claims that Elijah Cummings misallocated responsibility for the 15th Amendment during his 2016 speech was inherently inaccurate.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The Republic (Elija Cummings) mistakenly stated during his speech at the National Democratic Congress in 2016 that Democrats gave blacks the right to vote.
